A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Last Jedi destroys the world that JJ Abrams creates in "force awakens." 

to rehash "empire strikes back" is a poor move and shows that the director knows nothing about the lore of star wars if he and the creative team cannot make an original story arc.

this is the first movie I my cell phone to see what time it was and also the first movie in a long time I was tempted to walk out on. 

Movie is poorly paced and does nothing to explain why new characters are so powerful in the force. 

Director clearly has no idea how to use older characters and no idea how to use modern characters without adding bogus plot devices to include new characters into story. 

It is difficult to review this film without "spoilers" but on this last note- the opening act with "poe" vs the "destroyer" ; had the director actually look up the lore of star wars he would have known that "Destroyer Class frigates" are no bigger than the rebels "corellian corvettes " and the idea that a "destroyer" is a fleet killer is absurd. 

i am afraid to watch the third installment of the "new" star wars" and would rather wait to pay a dollar to rent it.
please disney do not allow amatures to create future "star wars" properties.
